page.title: 18Dartmoor National Park
page.content: { { {Dartmoor National Park 30,000 people live on Dartmoor. Dartmoor has approximately 8,000,000 visitors every year..There are nine rangers that look after the 100,000 acres of open common land.The block of land around Moretonhampstead is made up of farmland but is riddled with footpaths which are the rangers responsibility. The Moretonhampstead ranger is called Tom Pridmore.He often comes into school and takes classes out to clear the moor.Our school has been responsible for clearing the old stone circle on MARDON DOWN.
